name: Apogee (Noodle Games)
description:
SUMMARY

Cruise through a procedurally generated universe - exploring new planets and earning high scores along the way. Reach further distances to unlock new ships and move up the leaderboard rankings!

GAMEPLAY

Apogee is a physics-based arcade exploration game with a quirk: You can't steer! Take advantage of planet orbits to alter your trajectory, but be careful not to fly too close. Increase your score by visiting planets and meet milestones to unlock new ships with special attributes. Deliver cargo to drop-off points for a hefty score supplement, and make sure to collect extra lives!

DETAILS

Controls:

  • Requires mouse
  • Keybind remapping support
  • Partial controller / gamepad support
  • Hold or toggle control options

Leaderboards:

  • Requires an internet connection
  • Requires a nickname (entered in-game)

If you want to see any features added, or have any other suggestions leave them down below!
